transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir good afternoon, Vasundhara bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Kaise hai aap sir?
Executive: Accha sir wo aapka feedback aaya tha.
Executive: Haan, sir kal aapka na ek feedback aaya tha service ke regarding mein. Aapne wahi same aapne bataya bola hai ki isme close ticket refund karne ke liye.
Executive: Right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapko refund ka to hum pehle bhi bahut baar bata chuke hai ki hamare paas refund policy nahi hai. Thik hai? Dekhiye business aapko response milega aap bhi lead ki bol rahe ho more than 100 ke liye. Wo tab aapke account mein aayengi sir jab aap lead use karoge. Thik hai abhi system ko pata hi nahi chal raha ki aapki kis product ki kya lead chahiye.
Customer: Madam jyada jyada jyada angreji nahi bolo buddhi to mujhe ishwar ne buddhi mujhe bhi di hai aapko bhi di hai. Aap bhi business kar rahi hai mai bhi kar raha hu ab mujhe aapko special koi mangal grah se to aayi nahi hai ki specially dimag kharab mere ko samjha dogi aap jo hai.
Customer: Mai kya har aadmi apne apne business ke liye kaam karta hai. Aap samjhiye aap kaun kaun subject leke aayengi aap.
Executive: Sir thik hai I agree.
Customer: Mai nahi nahi kya kya use nahi kar raha mai kya use karu? Ab aap ek aaoge ki hum aap jo hai isme isme gadde mein kudne se gile nahi ho rahe ho aap jo hai. Ab gadde mein kudne ka mera kya matlab hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap meri meri ek baat samjhiye ek baat samjhiye sir aap pehle meri baat suniye.
Customer: Jo cheez mere use ki nahi hai mera time waste hoga usme mai kyu usko.
Executive: Sir time waste nahi hoga aap samjhiye to ek cheez ko sir sara system AI based hai. Agar aap lead consume hi nahi karte ho system ko pata hi nahi chalega ki aapko kya product ki lead jab aap chote KVA ki lead use karna start karoge automatically aapko bade KVA ki aana start ho jayegi sir.
Customer: Kariye madam madam kariye madam kariye kariye na.
Executive: Sir kaha kariye December October
Customer: October mahine se pure sir October mahine se pure mahine.
Customer: Ye ye AI AI ko select kiya ja sakta hai ki AI ko kaise kaha kaam karna hai. Pata hai aapko?
Executive: Sir aise nahi hota hai.
Executive: Wo aapke sirf balik consumption pattern pe depend karta hai.
Customer: To ye nahi to aap apna ek common package bana bana rakha hai aapne ki sabhi aadmiyon ke liye 33000 ka package hai jo bhi lead milengi wo sabke liye barabar milengi aisa hai?
Executive: Sir sabko lead barabar hi milti hai.
Customer: Package bataiye aapko kya mai baat samjhiye pehle dhyan se. Aapke paas kitne kitne package hai ki sabke common package hai ya alag alag hai?
Executive: Sir hamare paas packages ki listing hoti hai. Base package jo hota hai wo catalog services iske upar aapka TrustSeal hai fir domain website hai star service hai listing service hai lead supplier hai.
Customer: Aap pehle meri baat ka jawab do meri baat ka jawab do aapke paas package bade chote nahi hai saman package hai sare?
Executive: Sir bataya to maine aapke aapko hamare paas alag alag package hote hai sir.
Customer: Alag alag amount ke package hai na?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: To kyu hai wo karan kya hai?
Executive: Sir jaise jaise aapko business karna hai aap apni apni growth dekhoge.
Customer: Mujhe kya 10 lakh ka package de rakha hai ek ko 33000 ka package de rakha hai ek ko jo hai 5 lakh ka package de rakha hai usme uska unka uska matlab samjhao mujhe.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye agar aapko business IndiaMART se accha mil raha hai thik hai aap ek next level pe jana chahoge na apni company ki growth dekhoge na to aap next package pe jayenge.
Customer: Aap aapne AI ka hawala diya na mai aapse sawal puch raha hu sawal ka jawab hi nahi de rahi ho aap.
Customer: Kyu hai matlab wo AI ko.
Executive: Sir AI ko sir AI ko ye nahi sir AI ko ye nahi bola hai ki package in customer ko apne hisab se wo kar de. Wo customer ke upar depend karta hai.
Customer: Samjho samjho dhyan se samjho 33000 wale ko bhi wahi dhandha mil raha hai aur 5 lakh wale ko bhi wahi mil raha hai to 5 lakh uske aise uske galat bargala ke le rahe ho ya usko nuksan ho raha hai kahi na kahi dikkat to hai na.
Executive: Sir aap AI ka galat sense mein leke ja rahe hai. AI ka package pe koi sense nahi laga raha thik hai? Aapka AI jo hai wo aapke balik consumption aap meri baat ko sir pehle meri baat ko sun lijiye sir mai agar aapki baat sun rahi hu to meri baat bhi aap ek baar suniye pehle mai aapko kya samjhana chah rahi hu. Aapka jo AI hai wo aapke balik consumption behavior pe depend karta hai aap kaise lead use karte ho thik hai? Aapne sir dekhiye October mein sirf ek lead use kari hai pure mahine mein to aap mujhe batao ek lead use karke kaise business le aaoge aap.
Customer: Wo bhi wo bhi aapki jo high rate wali jo high lead hai wo unko mai consume kar raha hu aati hai wo bhi mujhe fraud jaisi lagti hai jab koi mai baat kar raha hu usme koi jawab hi nahi aata hai kuch nahi aata usko.
Executive: Sir November mein aapne sirf teen lead use kari hai. Sir hum aapko sirf ye kehna chah rahe hai aapke paas jitni bhi lead aa rahi hai.
Customer: Jo mere matlab mere matlab ki hai kariye nahi kariye.
Executive: Sir aap meri baat to samjhiye please samjhiye ek minute time deke samjhiye mai kya samjhana chah rahi hu. Mai sirf ye bol rahi hu ki aapko weekly lead 17 milti hai aap 17 mein se at least 10 lead to use kijiye weekly agar aapko small KVA ki bhi aa rahi hai aap pehle wo start karo use karna sir automatically system ko pata chalega.
Customer: Batao nahi nahi ye kuch ye tumne wo pagalpanthi ki baatein karne ja rahi ho aap nahi hai aap kariye kariye kaam kare usme.
Executive: Sir meri bina baat sune aap baat kaat dete ho.
Customer: Baat suniye baat suniye pehle usme jawab do mujhe.
Executive: Sir pehle meri pehle meri baat suniye to mai kya samjhana chah rahi hu sir aapko aap jab.
Customer: Meri baat aap bolo package jyada kam jyada kyu hai iska iska jawab do pehle.
Customer: Ek aadmi ka bada package hai ek aadmi ka chota package hai kyu hai?
Executive: Sir aap.
Customer: Sir sir ab mai aap se ek sawal puchti hu aap mujhe ek baat bataiye train mein general bhi hota hai sleeper bhi hota hai third AC bhi second AC bhi first AC to railway walon ne isi ke dabbe kyu banaye hai sabko ek category mein kyu nahi bhar diya aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Comfort ke hisab se log book karate hai na sir seat jisko jaisa comfort chahiye ab jisko jaisa business chahiye sir wo waisa listing service lega.
Executive: Sir sir aap ab mai aap se ek sawal puchti hu aap mujhe ek baat bataiye train mein general bhi hota hai sleeper bhi hota hai third AC bhi second AC bhi first AC to railway walon ne isi ke dabbe kyu banaye hai sabko ek category mein kyu nahi bhar diya aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Comfort ke hisab se log book karate hai na sir seat jisko jaisa comfort chahiye ab jisko jaisa business chahiye sir wo waisa listing service lega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for closed ticket.

- Why different packages have different prices.

- Leads are fraud-like, no response after initiating contact.



Resolution:

- Refund is not possible due to company policy.

- Explained that business depends on lead usage.

- Explained AI works based on consumption behavior.

- Explained different packages for different business growth.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, packages, ai
